name: part_008
file: tmp_【#白銀ノエル生誕祭2023】3Dバラエティ！あびゃびゃ！全国おいしい発見！～高級食材で牛丼づくりに挑む～【白銀ノエル⧸ホロライブ】 [Si2W-gcT1Lw]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: Noel explains her plan to cook the ultimate beef bowl, then suddenly transitions to the live performance section.
Transition and introduction to the live performance stage.
Performance of the song 'Love Me Under'.

subtitles.original: 究極の牛丼を調理していく
subtitles.english: I'm going to cook the ultimate beef bowl...

subtitles.original: という様子を見てもらおうと思っているんですが...
subtitles.english: ...is what I was planning to show you, but...

subtitles.original: が？
subtitles.english: But?

subtitles.original: が？
subtitles.english: But?

subtitles.original: ま、その前に、ライブパートでーす！
subtitles.english: Well, before that, it's time for the live performance!

subtitles.original: 急に？
subtitles.english: Suddenly?

subtitles.original: ライブパート？
subtitles.english: Live part?

subtitles.original: ほめのび
subtitles.english: Homenobi

subtitles.original: 練習中 シレっとこっそり準備進行
subtitles.english: Practicing, quietly and secretly making progress

subtitles.original: 心象 緊張で焦る
subtitles.english: Inner state: flustered with tension

subtitles.original: 言わんけど ツヨツヨありでしょ
subtitles.english: I don't say it, but I'm strong, right?

subtitles.original: 元気配るから待っちょって
subtitles.english: Wait for me, I'll be sharing some energy

subtitles.original: そうやって成長する子です
subtitles.english: That's how I grow

subtitles.original: いいかな
subtitles.english: Is it okay?

subtitles.original: ゆるポでOK？
subtitles.english: Is 'Yuru-po' okay?

subtitles.original: テンパっちゃってOK
subtitles.english: It's okay to panic

subtitles.original: 始めちゃお
subtitles.english: Let's get started

subtitles.original: ほめてほしいな ほめてほしいな
subtitles.english: I want to be praised, I want to be praised

subtitles.original: ほめてくれたら二倍増しで頑張る
subtitles.english: If you praise me, I'll work twice as hard

subtitles.original: 見ててほしいな
subtitles.english: I want you to watch me

subtitles.original: 見ててほしいな
subtitles.english: I want you to watch me

subtitles.original: ほめちぎられて伸びるタイプです
subtitles.english: I'm the type that thrives on praise

subtitles.original: ours
subtitles.english: ours

subtitles.original: 今日はこのままさよならじゃないよ
subtitles.english: It's not goodbye for today just yet

subtitles.original: 手をとってくれたのなら
subtitles.english: If you would only take my hand

subtitles.original: 秘密を眠りにつくような夜に君を連れていくよ
subtitles.english: In a night where secrets go to sleep, I'll take you with me

subtitles.original: それはたとえ 遠く離れていたって
subtitles.english: Even if we were to be far apart

subtitles.original: 手を繋いでいられるような奇跡のような
subtitles.english: Like a miracle that allows us to stay hand-in-hand

subtitles.original: 話をしよう お窓は開けといて
subtitles.english: Let's talk, keep the window open

subtitles.original: 今日までを思い出して
subtitles.english: Recalling everything up until today

subtitles.original: 一つ一つ並べたら
subtitles.english: Lining them up one by one

subtitles.original: 明日の雨が気になりだして
subtitles.english: I start to worry about tomorrow's rain

subtitles.original: どうも眠れないみたいだ
subtitles.english: And I can't seem to sleep

subtitles.original: 変わりたくないことや
subtitles.english: Things I don't want to change

subtitles.original: 変わらなきゃいけないことも
subtitles.english: And things that must change

subtitles.original: 少し忘れたまま
subtitles.english: Forgetting them a little

subtitles.original: 窓の外眺めていたんだ
subtitles.english: I was gazing out the window

subtitles.original: 雨が降り出す その前に
subtitles.english: Before the rain starts falling

subtitles.original: 君のところまで行けるような気がして
subtitles.english: I feel like I can make it to where you are

subtitles.original: 目を閉じて そしてこのまま遠くへと行こう
subtitles.english: Close your eyes, and let's go far away like this

subtitles.original: 手をとってくれるかな
subtitles.english: Will you take my hand?

subtitles.original: 秘密を眠りにつくような夜を君と泳いでいくよ
subtitles.english: In a night where secrets go to sleep, I'll swim through it with you

subtitles.original: 街の灯りが消えるたびに笑って
subtitles.english: Laughing every time the city lights go out

subtitles.original: 路地裏で抱き合う
subtitles.english: Embracing in the back alleys

subtitles.original: バカみたいな話をしよう
subtitles.english: Let's talk about silly things

subtitles.original: 窓は開けといて
subtitles.english: Keep the window open

subtitles.original: 聞こえる？
subtitles.english: Can you hear it?

subtitles.original: 聞こえる
subtitles.english: I can hear it

subtitles.original: ラブミーアンダー
subtitles.english: Love Me Under

subtitles.original: 位置について よーいドンで 周回遅れで
subtitles.english: On your mark, get set, go, a lap behind

subtitles.original: 明日は二周遅れ？
subtitles.english: Tomorrow, two laps behind?

subtitles.original: あのね 理由もなく夜明けになる日は
subtitles.english: You know, on days when dawn comes for no reason

subtitles.original: 心が疲れてる証拠
subtitles.english: It's proof that the heart is tired

subtitles.original: でもね 笑う門には福も見に来てかもって
subtitles.english: But they say fortune comes to those who laugh

subtitles.original: Oh Baby What a Beautiful Day
subtitles.english: Oh baby What a beautiful day
